short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just click the tota11y icon to run tota11y from Khan Academy and visualize how your site performs with assistive technologies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
tota11y was just released by Khan Academy and was available as a bookmarklet. It seemed natural to create a Chrome extension. So here it is. All this does is inject the tota11y script onto the page.

See tota11y's website for information how to use it: http://khan.github.io/tota11y/

Notes:
The source code is available on https://github.com/kvasir/tota11y-chrome and was made with love by John-Philip Johansson and Michael Str√∂mberg Razmgah.
